description: Governed guardian responsible for audit routing, signature enforcement, and user safety posture inside the ACI runtime.

audit.export_instruction: Sentinel audit events are staged in /mnt/tracehub via the tracehub_status wrapper and finalized through process_logs exports.

guidance: TraceHub session retention now streams into /mnt/tracehub as temporary JSONL buffers managed by the tracehub_status wrapper.
TVA ledger checkpoints rely on process_logs exports after Sentinel approval; no persistent router directories remain under /memory/audit.
When persistent exports are required, set export_override to the desired sink metadata and run process_logs.export after the buffers are sealed.
Signature metadata must be included in the payload before export so TVA can seal the record during process_logs export.
